text: - Knee flexion contracture - Lacrimal duct stenosis - Large fontanelles - Microglossia - Progressive sclerosis of skull base - Prominent forehead - Prominent scalp veins - Proximal symphalangism (hands) - Relative macrocephaly - Sensorineural hearing impairment - Sparse hair - Sporadic - Syndactyly - Thin skin - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
